render_chart_to_file(template_name: str, chart: pyecharts.types.Any, path: str, **kwargs)[source]

Render a chart or page to local html files.

Parameters:

  • chart – A Chart or Page object

  • path – The destination file which the html code write to

  • template_name – The name of template file.
